00065   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListCmdOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00066   {
00067     boost::posix_time::ptime pt;
00068     size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00069     bool listAll = options->isAdminListOption();
00070 
00071     if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0 || listAll)) {
00072        UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00073        throw e;
00074     }
00075 
00076     if(userIdSize!=0) {
00077        //To check if the user id is correct
00078       checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00079 
00080       addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00081     } else {
00082             if(!listAll) {
00083                addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00084             }
00085     }
00086 
00087     if(options->getSessionId().size()!=0) {
00088       //To check if the session id is correct
00089       checkSessionId(options->getSessionId());
00090 
00091       addOptionRequest("vsessionid", options->getSessionId(), sqlRequest);
00092     }
00093 
00094     long startDate = options->getStartDateOption();
00095     if(startDate!=-1) {
00096       pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(startDate);
00097       std::string startDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00098       addTimeRequest("starttime", startDateStr, sqlRequest, ">=");
00099     }
00100 
00101     long endDate = options->getEndDateOption();
00102     if(endDate!=-1) {
00103       pt =  boost::posix_time::from_time_t(endDate);
00104       std::string endDateStr =  boost::posix_time::to_simple_string(pt);
00105       addTimeRequest("endtime", endDateStr, sqlRequest, "<=");
00106     }
00107   }

00115   UMS_Data::ListCommands* list()
00116   {
00117     DatabaseResult *ListOfCommands;
00118     std::string sqlListOfCommands;
00119     std::vector<std::string>::iterator ii;
00120     std::vector<std::string> results;
00121     std::string description;
00122 
00123     //MAPPER CREATION
00124     Mapper* mapper = MapperRegistry::getInstance()->getMapper(UMSMAPPERNAME);
00125 
00126     sqlListOfCommands = "SELECT ctype, vsessionid, name, description, starttime, endtime, userid from "
00127                          " vsession, clmachine, command, users where vsession.numsessionid=command.vsession_numsessionid and "
00128                          " vsession.clmachine_numclmachineid=clmachine.numclmachineid and  vsession.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";
00129 
00130 
00131     UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = UMS_Data::UMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00132     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListCommands();
00133 
00134     //Creation of the object user
00135     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00136     userServer.init();
00137     //if the user exists
00138     if (userServer.exist()) {
00139 
00140       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListOfCommands);
00141 
00142       //To get the list of commands from the database
00143       ListOfCommands = mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfCommands.c_str());
00144       if (ListOfCommands->getNbTuples() != 0){
00145         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfCommands->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00146           results.clear();
00147           results = ListOfCommands->get(i);
00148           ii = results.begin();
00149 
00150           UMS_Data::Command_ptr command = ecoreFactory->createCommand();
00151           command->setCommandId(convertCmdType(static_cast<CmdType>(convertToInt(*ii))));
00152           command->setSessionId(*(++ii));
00153           command->setMachineId(*(++ii));
00154           description = mapper->decode(*(++ii));
00155           command->setCmdDescription(description);
00156           command->setCmdStartTime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00157           command->setCmdEndTime(convertToTimeType(*(++ii)));
00158 
00159           mlistObject->getCommands().push_back(command);
00160         }
00161     }
00162 
00163   }
00164   else {
00165       UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USER);
00166       throw e;
00167   }
00168   return mlistObject;
00169   }

00187   std::string convertCmdType(CmdType type) {
00188 
00189     std::string cmd;
00190     switch(type) {
00191       case UMS :
00192          cmd = "UMS";
00193          break;
00194       case TMS :
00195          cmd = "TMS";
00196          break;
00197       case FMS :
00198          cmd = "FMS";
00199          break;
00200       case IMS :
00201          cmd = "IMS";
00202          break;
00203     }
00204     return cmd;
00205   }
